column1: Rubric adapted from:  Stodden V, Guo P, Ma Z (2013) Toward Reproducible Computational Research: An Empirical Analysis of Data and Code Policy Adoption by Journals. PLoS ONE 8(6): e67111. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0067111

column3: Protein, Proteomic, Genomic Data Sharing Required with Deposit to Specific Data Banks

column2: Required as condition of publication, barring exceptions
Required but, no explicit statement regarding effect on publication/editorial decisions
Only protein, proteomic, and/or genomic data sharing are addressed.

column1: Journal Access Mark (Whole Journal Model, Does Not Consider Hybrid Publishing)

column4: Journal will host regardless of size
Journal has data hosting file/s size limit

column3: Archival/Retention Policy (Statement about how long the data should be retained).
Reproducibility or Analogous Concepts Noted as Purpose of Data Policy
